Sentencas: Current energy systems have a significant environmental impact and contribute to the climate change.
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: The future energy systems must call upon clean and renewable sources, capable of producing energy with low CO2 emission, hence partly decarbonizing the energy sector.
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: Producing H-2 by catalytic steam reforming of methanol (CSRM) is gaining interest for its specific applications in fuel cells, in a decentralized H-2 production, or to locally boost the heat content of e.g. natural gas.
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: Supported metal catalysts enhance the endothermic steam-driven methanol conversion.
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: The paper discusses the CSRM manufactures and assesses 2 novel, cheap and efficient catalysts (Co/alpha-Al2O3 and MnFe2O4).
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: The performance of the Co/alpha-Al2O3 catalyst is significantly superior to MnFe2O4.
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: The methanol conversion exceeds 95% with high H-2 yields (> 2.5 mol H-2/mol CH3OH) and low CO and CO2 by-product formation.
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: The methanol reaction is very fast and a nearly constant product distribution is achieved for gas-catalyst contact times in excess of 0.3 s.
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: The catalyst maintains its efficiency and selectivity for several days of reaction.
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: The hydrogen productivity of the Co/alpha-Al2O3 is about 0.9 L H(2 )g(cat)(-1) h(-1)., nearly a fourfold of the MnFe2O4 alternative.
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: The different occurring reactions are combined in a kinetics analysis and demonstrate the high rate of reaction and the predicted product distribution.
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: A catalytic sintered metal fleece reactor is finally developed, mostly in view of its integration with a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts

Sentencas: The assessed CSRM system clearly merits further pilot plant research.
Titulo: Producing hydrogen by catalytic steam reforming of methanol using non-noble metal catalysts
